title: How many pages is a 5000-word essay? - Quora

response.answer_text: It depends on the formatting. If it is a single spaced essay in MLA format, you’re looking at around 10 pages. If it is a double spaced essay in MLA format, you’re looking at around 20 pages. A good rule of thumb is 500 words per page in a single spaced essay and 250 words per page in a double spaced essay. Obviously, this can vary based on the length of the words you are using.
A double-spaced page in Times New Roman (which is the typical font for colleges) results about about 350 words per page. So do the math.
